segments.text: I see the open cabinets filled with promises of sweet treats and laughter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But underneath that joy, there’s a risk that makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s small stature seems dwarfed by the towering cabinet doors, adding to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he wobbles on the stool makes me gasp; it’s a precarious ballet of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the woman is stuck in her routine, as though everything is perfectly normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s hard to reconcile her tranquility with the bubbling chaos behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she would just turn around and see what is happening, but she is lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR
